Articles.Content: You are in the rickety rockets capsule, you pull on the levers at random and feel the rocket tipping over!

The rocket is shaking violently... you don't know if it will make it to the Mun.

>Abort Flight

>Continue
Continue.....

The engine abruptly reaches 500% of its thrust. Jeb is screaming.

>Throw Jeb out

>Keep on going.
Keep on going!

NINJA SAL!

Anyway, you keep on going and it remarkibally reaches orbit... the engine is damaged however. Should we...

>Return to Kerbin

>Go to Mun

>Go to Minmus

>Go to Duna

>Go to Eeloo

Go to Eeloo!!

Jeb is now elevated, However Bob is crying.

Your batteries are nearly dead, and upon the way to Eeloo, you have a chance encounter with your refuelling space station.

Do you?

>Crash into the space station

>Dock and refuel

>Go straight past
Go straight, refuel is for the weak!

You're now zooming off towards Eeloo. However, due to orbital factors not yet understood, there is a Jool encounter marker right in the middle of your orbit, and the plotted path goes right through the atmosphere. It won't affect you that much, only a minor course correction is needed to get back to Eeloo.. Do you

Correct course for Eeloo?

Try for a Jool aerocapture?
Correct course for Eeloo!

Now the Kraken is attempting a flyby

>Shoot the SRBs!!!

>Do nothing

>Try to avoid him

Shoot the SRBs!!!

*space*

*space*

Your batteries are dead.

>Send Jeb our to fight the Kraken

>Make Bill and Bob scream to scare the kraken away
Make Jeb fight the Kraken.

The kraken becomes angry and glitches your ship's course back to a collision course with Kerbin. Do you..

>Attempt to go back for Jeb

>Try to go back to Eeloo

>Check for parachutes

Edited November 4, 2013 by Piv
Try to go back to Eeloo

Your ship has successfully landed on Eeloo, but you don't have enough fuel for the return trip!

Do you:

>mine kethane

>build an igloo to survive the night

>make bob eat the yellow snow
Eat yellow snow

Bob pukes.

Make Jeb eat the snow

Make Bill eat it

Mine this weird green stuff called "explosive kethane"
Set fire to the inflammable kethane

Eeloo became a big flaming ball (no oxigene, but anyway...)p

Try to take out the fire

Shoot Bob to kerbin

Summon the Kraken
I'll buy the Kraken for $1, bob!

The Kraken take the ship and throw it in space

Edited November 4, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse
Defeat Kraken.

He get berzerk and destroy kerbin

What do you do?
Go to Duna!
